title: Corporations carrying on business in partnership
context: §235-72 Corporations carrying on business in partnership. Corporations carrying on business in partnership shall be treated in the same manner by this chapter as they are treated by the Internal Revenue Code. [L Sp 1957, c 1, pt of §2; Supp, §121-24; HRS §235-72; am L 1978, c 173, §2(14)]
